decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the
Existing GA, Site & Location Plan, prepared by Blueprint Vista + Architecture, dated May 2024
Illustrating Previously Approved GA & Site Plan, prepared by Blueprint Vista + Architecture, Rev. A dated April 2024
Proposed GA & Site Plan, prepared by Blueprint Vista + Architecture, dated May 2024

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The three proposed windows on the southern elevation at first floor level hereby approved shall at no time be openable or glazed, otherwise than in obscured glass, below a minimum height of 1.7 metres above the relevant floor level.
Reason: To ensure that the proposed development does not prejudice the amenities of adjoining occupiers, in accordance with Policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).

| Other than the existing balcony shown on the existing drawings, no additional area of the roof of the extensions shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and policies 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012). | The development hereby permitted shall be commenced and completed in its entirety and simultaneously.

Reason:  In the interests of visual appearance and to ensure the living conditions of the occupiers of each property is protected, in accordance with the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013), policy 1.1 (g) of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012) and policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Two storey side, part two part single storey rear extension (Joint Application)
